comment.body: It is not peaceful. You are not enjoying it. This is the worst excuse of a blog I have ever seen in my whole life.

> [assman](#comment_1_18AAv2MxpUxLjG6U64nucoBg833eTaR83u): Notice how you are the only one who makes personal insults.

Right.  

> I don't know if you enjoy this discussion. You might or might not enjoy it, others might not or might not enjoy it, but I do. I do enjoy this discussion.

Well alright then. Let's keep at it. I will keep'em _insults_ coming. Don't you worry.

> Why do you keep making such insults?

Is this the best you can do impersonating a SJW again? Why would I stop insulting you when you enjoy it so much?
